references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which are foundational to many of the diffusion models used for image generation and editing in the current research.

references.paper_title: Blended diffusion for text-driven editing of natural images
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for text-driven image editing using blended diffusion, which is highly relevant to the current research's approach to training-free image editing.

references.paper_title: Building normalizing flows with stochastic interpolants
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel technique for building normalizing flows, which are used in some of the latest diffusion models for improved training and sampling and directly relates to the current research.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces a state-of-the-art model for image synthesis using flow transformers, which is highly relevant to the current research and directly impacts its core methodology.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents GLIDE, a text-guided diffusion model for photorealistic image generation and editing, which is highly relevant to the current research and directly inspires its approach to image editing.
